content: this looks great in a yarn with a fleck - it would also look great in self-patterning yarn - or knitted in stripes aran weight yarn 10ply 4mm & 5mm needles worked flat - but easy to convert to knitting in the round 18sts = 4 10cm great little gift for a baby boy or girl **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
